meeting_info.organization: City of Dallas Public Facility Corporation Board of Directors
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Auditorium L1FN and Videoconference, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, TX 75201

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the minutes of December 5, 2023 Board Meeting

agenda_items.title: Election of Board Secretary
agenda_items.description: Election of Vacant Dallas PFC Board Secretary Position

agenda_items.title: Appointment of General Manager
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution authorizing the appointment of Albert Gonzalez, PFC Administrator, as the Corporation’s General Manager

agenda_items.title: Directors and Officers Insurance
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of Directors and Officers Insurance coverage for the Dallas Public Facility Corporation’s Board of Directors and Officers

agenda_items.title: 2023 Annual Report
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of 2023 Annual Report

agenda_items.title: Website Design Services
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of Cimone Key Creative Studio, LLC for website design and maintenance services

agenda_items.title: Audit Services
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of Logan and Associates, P.C. for audit services

agenda_items.title: Home Improvement Program
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of instituting a Dallas Public Facility Corporation home improvement and preservation program

agenda_items.title: Income Targets
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the Dallas Public Facility Corporation Program’s household area median income targets

agenda_items.title: Financial Contributions
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of Dallas Public Facility Corporation’s financial contributions

agenda_items.title: Bylaws Review
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the Dallas Public Facility Corporation’s Bylaws

agenda_items.title: Staff Hiring Updates
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of DPFC staff hiring updates

agenda_items.title: Treasurer’s Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of Dallas PFC Treasurer’s Report

agenda_items.title: Pipeline Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of Dallas PFC Pipeline Report
